Subject: root
admin
.groups HAS adm
Description: Members of the adm group have no restriction

Subject: .groups HAS administrators
Description: Administrators are allowed to read and modify any database

Subject: .groups HAS administrators
Description: Administrators are allowed to read and modify any module

Subject: .groups HAS managers
Description: Managers can access modules in Management category and write accounts database

Subject: .authenticated
Description: Authenticated users can read any database and instantiate any module

Subject: .authenticated
Description: Authenticated users can query Welcome and Status module

Subject: .authenticated
Description: Authenticated users have full control on UserProfile module

Subject: NOT (.groups HAS administrators)
Description: Unprivileged user can set his own password -- #1580

Subject: .groups HAS administrators OR .groups HAS managers
Description: Administrators and Managers can set other users' password -- #1580
